meaning: all show no substance, just for show, fake

examples.chinese: 原來這個傢伙是個樣子貨！
examples.translation: So this guy was all show after all!

examples.chinese: 他打扮成那樣，還以為多厲害，原來只是個樣子貨！
examples.translation: He dressed up like that, I thought he was impressive, but he's just all show!

examples.chinese: 這台機器是樣子貨，根本不能用。
examples.translation: This machine is just for show, it doesn't even work.

sourceEnglish: deceptive, showy, false impression, just for show
